title: Zipline LXC
textContent:
Zipline LXC 
                Zipline is a
                    ShareX/file upload server that is easy to use, packed with features, and with an easy setup!
                To create a new Proxmox VE Zipline LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update Zipline, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/zipline.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 5GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                Zipline Interface: IP:3000
                ⚙️ Initial Login
                username administrator
                password password
outerHTML:
Zipline LXC

Zipline is a ShareX/file upload server that is easy to use, packed with features, and with an easy setup!

To create a new Proxmox VE Zipline LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Zipline, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/zipline.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 5GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

Zipline Interface: IP:3000

⚙️ Initial Login

username administrator

password password
